thread.title: Mickey Mouse's Big Break American Experience
thread.title_full: Video: Mickey Mouse's Big Break | Watch American Experience Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Mickey Mouse's Big Break American Experience
text: The premiere of "Steamboat Willie" blows audiences away with its innovative use of sound. Mickey Mouse soon becomes a phenomenon. "Walt Disney" premieres September 14 and 15 on PBS American Experience.
